ol.li: This procedure contains the requirements for developing a Stormwater Pollution Prevention Plan to include a stormwater pollution prevention team, an inventory of potential pollutant sources, a list of past spills and leaks, non-stormwater discharges, best management practices, spill prevention and response, evaluations, inspections, and record keeping.
All environmental, health and safety regulations as defined by national, regional, and local regulatory agencies shall supersede the requirements of this procedure.
